name: NSSpringLoadingDestination
desc: A set of methods that the destination object (or recipient) of a dragged object can implement to support spring-loading.

items.name: func springLoadingActivated(Bool, draggingInfo: NSDraggingInfo)
items.desc: Responds to the activation or deactivation of spring-loading on a destination.

items.name: func springLoadingHighlightChanged(NSDraggingInfo)
items.desc: Updates the destinationâ€™s user interface to display a new highlighting style during a spring-loading operation.

items.name: func springLoadingEntered(NSDraggingInfo) -> NSSpringLoadingOptions
items.desc: Returns whether to enable or disable spring-loading when a drag enters the bounds of the spring-loading destination.

items.name: func springLoadingUpdated(NSDraggingInfo) -> NSSpringLoadingOptions
items.desc: Returns whether to enable or disable spring-loading as a drag moves within the bounds of the spring-loading destination or draggingInfo changes during the drag.

items.name: func springLoadingExited(NSDraggingInfo)
items.desc: Responds when a drag exits the bounds of the spring-loading destination.

items.name: func draggingEnded(NSDraggingInfo)
items.desc: Responds to the end of a drag operation.

items.name: struct NSSpringLoadingOptions
items.desc: These constants denote the type of spring-loading behavior configured for the destination object.
